participant_1.background:
I love to watch the voice.
I graduated from princeton.
I travel at least once a year.
My favorite thing to do is to go to museums.

participant_2.background:
I eat a strictly vegan diet.
Ocd rules my life , and i have a hard time relinquishing control.
I am a seventh day adventist.
I teach elementary school children at a private school.
My friends tell me that i m a neurotic hypochondriac.

content.text: Hi! I'm a huge fan of The Voice. What's your favorite season?
I'm a little obsessed with The Voice too! My favorite season was season 5, when Tessanne Chin won. She was so talented!
I loved season 5 too! Tessanne was amazing. I also loved Christina Grimmie.
Oh, I loved Christina Grimmie too! She was so talented and she had such a bright future ahead of her. It's so sad that she passed away.
I know, it's so tragic. She was such a young and talented artist.
I agree. She had such a big heart and she was always so positive.
I know, it's hard to believe she's gone.
Me too. She will always be remembered for her beautiful music and her kind heart.
I agree. She was a true inspiration to us all.
She was. I'm so glad I got to see her perform before she passed away.
Me too. It was an amazing experience.
It was. I'll never forget it.
Me neither.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I love to travel. I've been to a few different countries, but I'd love to travel more.
Me too! I love experiencing different cultures and meeting new people.
Me too. It's so much fun to learn about different ways of life.
I agree. It's really eye-opening.
So, where have you been traveling?
I've been to Mexico, Canada, and the United Kingdom.
Oh, that's awesome! I've been to Mexico and Canada too. I love both countries.
Me too! They're both so beautiful and diverse.
I agree. They're both great places to visit.
So, what are some of your favorite museums?
I love the Metropolitan Museum of Art in New York City. It's one of the largest and most comprehensive museums in the world.
Oh, I love that museum too! I've been there a few times.
Me too! I love seeing all of the different art collections.
I agree. It's amazing to see so much art in one place.
So, what are some of your favorite things to do at museums?
I love to explore the different exhibits and learn about new cultures and art.
Me too! It's so much fun to learn about different things.
I agree. I love being exposed to new ideas and ways of thinking.
Me too. It's so important to keep an open mind.
I agree. It's the best way to learn and grow.
